participant_1.background:
I spend a lot of time exercising and eating healthy foods to maintain my toned body.
I love kids and dogs, but I could never be a teacher if I were blind.
I'm heading home after a long run to see my girlfriend and eat some tacos.
I enjoy reading books to distract myself from pain.
My favorite book is a collection of spooky Halloween stories.

participant_2.background:
I was recently bedridden for a week, so I had to eat a lot of soft foods that were easy to digest.
i like to race go carts.
I grow my own vegetables and cook them myself.
pizza is my favorite food.
I want a home with a big yard for my dogs to run and play in.

content.text: I'm doing well, thanks for asking. I'm on my way home after a long run. How about you?
I'm doing well, thank you! I was recently bedridden for a week, so I'm happy to be up and about again.
That sounds rough! I'm glad you're feeling better. What did you do to pass the time?
I read a lot of books and watched a lot of movies.
My favorite book is a collection of spooky Halloween stories.
I love spooky Halloween stories! Do you have any pets?
That's great! I have a cat.
I'm headed home to see my dogs and eat some pizza. What are you doing after you get home?
I'm going to see my girlfriend and eat some tacos.
